body: The manga becomes dull and directionless after the events covered in the anime. Pointless plot where Akane who's now in collage has to go back to high school only to escort a foreign princess who more a pain in the ass than Akane was. The older siblings are simply written off and the youngest are there without purpose.

@aniki82a1 Well pretty much the anime and manga  is just a daily lives of the royal family.......though at least their are so called progress in this manga like Shuu pretty much already ready to marry her GF idk about our heroine thoguh what will happen forgot what was happening on this series.
I really liked joukamachi no dandelion. Too bad it just didnt go anywhere.
